availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James W. McDaniel (Muhlenberg County, Ky farmer )

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, farmer. Hopkins County, Kentucky native. Son of Samuel McDaniel and Artimesia M. Roark McDaniel. Married to Nancy Bibb McDaniel in Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, on May 4, 1859. Student in Muhlenberg County in 1850. Farmer in Muhlenberg County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 1, p. 205B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, p. 628.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994050, Muhlenberg County Marriages, p. 259-60.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #8483.
